text: Ubisoft Divertissements Inc., known as Ubisoft Montreal, is a Canadian video game developer and a studio of Ubisoft based in Montreal. == Games made == Ubisoft Montreal is the main developer for games in the Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six, and Watch Dogs series. * Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell series (2002–2010) * Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series (2003–present) * Far Cry series (2005–2019) * Assassin's Creed series (2007–present) * Watch Dogs series (2014–2016) * For Honor (2017) * Hyper Scape (2020) Category:1997 establishments in Canada Category:Video game companies of Canada Category:Companies based in Montreal
title: Ubisoft Montreal
